ModMetaData.description:
[h1]SimpleStairs (Fork)[/h1]
This is a [b]fork[/b] of the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2926310517]original "SimpleStairs" mod[/url] for RimWorld, updated to support [b]version 1.6[/b].
As of RimWorld 1.6, the [b]placingDraggableDimensions[/b] XML element used in 1.5 is no longer supported. It has been superseded by [b]drawStyleCategory[/b], which should be used to specify the visual and interaction style of placeable objects.
[hr]
[h2]📦 Differences from the Original Mod[/h2]
[list] [*][b]placingDraggableDimensions[/b] has been replaced by [b]drawStyleCategory[/b] to control object placement and visual behavior. [/list]
[hr]
[h2]📌 Notes[/h2]
[list] [*]This is [b]not an official update[/b] by the original author. [*]This is a simple update for 1.6 compatibility. [*]The mod should be safe to use in existing saves, but always back up your game just in case. [/list]
[hr]
[h2]📜 Credits[/h2]
[list] [*]Original mod by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198109651831/]gomi[/url] ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2926310517]Workshop page[/url]) [*]1.6 update by [url=https://github.com/b0unt9]Bounty[/url] [/list]
[hr]
[h2]🔧 Compatibility[/h2]
[list] [*]RimWorld 1.5, 1.6 [*]Incompatible with the original mod (disable one or the other) [/list]
[hr]
[h2]💬 Feedback[/h2]
Issues or suggestions? Feel free to leave a comment or contact me via GitHub: [url=https://github.com/rw-mod/SimpleStairs]github.com/rw-mod/SimpleStairs[/url]
